title: Sound Pack for RPG Games
description: Sound pack for RPG games 470 samples
longDescription:
Sound pack for RPG games


Consists of


Аctions (35 samples) explosions 5 sounds, door 5 sounds, levers 5 sounds, coins 5 sounds,Paper 5 sound,

Water Drops 4 sounds, Water Loop 1 loop, Fire 3 loop, keys 2 sounds.


Аttаcks (60 samples) AttackBow 10 sounds, Bow Impact 10 sounds, Axe 10 sounds, AxeBlow 10 sounds, Sword 10 sounds, SwordShield 10 sound.


Crаfting (25 samples) Blow axe Wood 5 sound, Bottle 5 sound, CraftingMolot 5 sound, DropPotion 3 sound, Potion 2 loop, Items 5 sound.


Magic (60 samples) Magic water 10 sounds, Magic earth 10 sounds, Magic fire 10 sounds, Magic dark 10 sounds,

Magic frost 10 sounds, Magic electricity 10 sounds.


Magic Elixir (30 samples) water 5 sounds, earth 5 sounds, fire 5 sounds, dark 5 sounds, frost 5 sounds, electricity 5 sounds.


Footsteps (100 samples) StepsEarth 20 sounds, StepsGrass 20 sounds, StepsSand 20 sounds, StepsStone 20 sounds, StepsWater 20 sounds.


Footsteps Monsters (100 samples) StepsEarth 20 sounds, StepsGrass 20 sounds, StepsSand 20 sounds, StepsStone 20 sounds, StepsWater 20 sounds.


Voices (60 samples)


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/valery-oleynikov/sets/sound-pack-for-rpg-games
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 470

Number of Audio Cues: 470

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Seamless audio loop - Yes

Intended Platform: all

Tested Platforms: Windows

Documentation Included: No

Support: mgwsound@icloud.com﻿

Size 85MB
